title: The Blood Trilogy
description: BOOK 1 - BLOOD MOON OVER AFRICAA gripping novel set in Africa, a place where superstition and witchcraft runs deep, a place of beauty, but where death can lurk in the shadows.A land shrouded in mystery, with ancient beliefs simmering beneath the surface set on a collision course with modern western ideas.Blood Moon deals with how an innocent act unleashes a horror that walks the African night, under the full moon, and nothing is safe.BOOK 2 - BLOOD SPOOR IN THE DARKWith Fear, Comes Power. Set in Modern Africa. Travel deep into the Congo Basin and come face to face with The Secret Sect. Experience the superstition and witchcraft of The Leopard MenBOOK 3 - BLOOD DEMON: REVENGEPure evil that walks in the African bush.
